description: Ryo Saeba is back as the City Hunter, a "sweeper" (private detective) working on the streets of Tokyo. He and sidekick Kaori Makimura are hired to solve the problems of desperate people. When Ryo is not using his sharp shooting skills against bad guys, he's aiming his sites on pretty ladies. Kaori uses a giant anti-ecchi hammer to make sure he behaves

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Police
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of law enforcement officers.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

title.native: シティーハンタースペシャル ザ・シークレット・サービス

name.native: ハンス＝ジークフリート

node.description:
[Official Website](http://www.hojo-tsukasa.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hojo_official)

He studied technical design at Kyushu Sangyo University, where he began to draw manga. Hojo is a mentor of Takehiko Inoue (creator of Slam Dunk) and a longtime friend of Tetsuo Hara (creator of Fist of the North Star). Designed the character Reina, who was introduced in the 2006 movie Hokuto no Ken: Raō Den - Jun'ai no Shō.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/浦上靖夫)

Founder of [Audio Planning U](https://anilist.co/studio/6561/), and the father of [Keiko](https://anilist.co/staff/162367/) and [Yasuyuki Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/144509/).

In 2016, he received an Honorary Achievement Award for his role as a sound director in [Detective Conan](https://anilist.co/anime/235/).

Date of Birth: June 24th, 1931
Birthplace: Paris, France
Date of Death: November 12th, 2013

After joining [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/Sunrise) and serving as a production assistant, he made his debut as a director in the 10th episode of [Aoki Ryuusei SPT Layzner](https://anilist.co/anime/3079/Aoki-Ryuusei-SPT-Layzner/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/suwacchi)

Michihiko is a producer, planner and supervisor. He is a chief producer at Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation.

After joining [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/Sunrise) and serving as a production assistant, he made his debut as a director in the 10th episode of [Aoki Ryuusei SPT Layzner](https://anilist.co/anime/3079/Aoki-Ryuusei-SPT-Layzner/).
Joined Audio Planning U in 1982, where he studied under [Yasuo Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/111277/).
He was originally part of Studio Live, but in 1995 switched over to Studio Fantasia.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiroshikoujina)

The representative director of Studio Live.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/東潤一)

Founder and representative director of Studio Easter.
